Patrick is one of 10 admitted steroid
users with kidney disease that
researchers at Columbia University
Medical Center are examining since
steroid use is illegal without a
prescription gathering a large sample
size has been difficult for researchers
however their findings published this
past November are among the first to
draw a direct link between long-term
steroid use and kidney damage his
doctors told him to immediately stop
working out and to begin to lose weight
otherwise more damage could be done to
